thread.title: Watch the Patriots’ Jamie Collins defy gravity and Colts with soaring blocked kick - Patriots
thread.title_full: Watch the Patriots’ Jamie Collins defy gravity and Colts with soaring blocked kick - Patriots

author: boston.com
title: Watch the Patriots’ Jamie Collins defy gravity and Colts with soaring blocked kick - Patriots
text:
Jamie Collins delivered more embarrassment to the Colts special teams.
Their failed experiment with a fake-punt formation was roundly mocked Sunday night—and on Monday morning . Patriots linebacker Collins made things worse by blocking a Colts PAT following Indy’s final touchdown in the fourth quarter of the Patriots’ 34-27 win.
Collins took a running start and jumped over the offensive line by timing his hurdle with the snap. And Adam Vinatieri’s kick didn’t stand a chance, as Collins blocked the ball with his leg.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Jamie Collins: Ridiculous. pic.twitter.com/fOEf1c5x0w
— Joon Lee (@iamjoonlee) October 19, 2015 PHOTOS: Colts fans mock Patriots with Deflategate signs and gear
